snippet: A performance by Kathak veteran Pandit Birju Maharaj and an all-night dance festival at Chidambaram,Tamil Nadu.
abstract: A performance by Kathak veteran Pandit Birju Maharaj and an all-night dance festival at Chidambaram,Tamil Nadu.
lead_paragraph: “Sooner or later much— by no means all — of the world’s best dance comes to New York,” Alastair Macaulay, wrote in The New York Times, “yet dance grows in meaning when we see it within its culture.”

headline.main: Jookin and Other Special Performances of 2012
